   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to FIMS documentation's documentation!
==============================================

Contained here is documentation for users and developers of the FIMS field information management software.  
FIMS is a modular application, so most of the content here is directed to those features shared in the common
set of functions and services contained in the biocode-fims-commons.jar file.  The functionalities contained here
drive the creation of all identifiers, and interpreting validation rules.  The documentation here will be explicit 
whenever reference particular instances (installed applications) of the FIMS.

which is 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
